---
title: "Rural Map"
output: html_document
date: '2022-06-30'
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(ggthemes)
library(tigris)
```

```{r}
echo = FALSE
rural <- get_decennial(geography = "state",
              variables = c("P001001", "P002005"),
              year = 2010,
              output = "wide",
              geometry = TRUE) |>
  shift_geometry()
```

```{r}
echo = FALSE
rural |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(fill = P002005 *100 / P001001)) +
    geom_sf() +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "plasma",
                         direction = -1) +
    theme_void() + 
    labs(title = "Rural Geography of the United States",
         fill = "Percent Rural", color = "Percent Rural",
         caption = "Source: Census 2010")
```
